questions.question: 1. With reference to TRIAC which of the following statement is WRONG?

answers.a: TRIAC conducts in only one direction.
answers.d: TRIAC can be triggered with positive as well as a negative gate signals.

explanations.a: Option A is correct because it is the wrong statement among all. A TRIAC is a bidirectional device, meaning it conducts current in both directions during alternate half cycles of AC. Saying it conducts in only one direction is false. Hence, option A is incorrect and is the right answer to the question asked.

explanations.d: A TRIAC (Triode for Alternating Current) is a bidirectional switch, which means it can conduct current in both directions when triggered. It is widely used for controlling AC power.
